item.title: CVE-2024-34670|2024-10-08T13:27:19.140Z -- samsung%20mobile -- sound%20assistant
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication in Sound Assistant prior to version 6.1.0.9 allows local attackers to get sensitive information.
